content.text: In pairs or as a group, come up with as many words related to games as you can - for example, board game, play, team, counter. Share on the board and discuss.
What kind of games do you like playing?
What games did you enjoy playing as a child?
Did you have a favourite game while at school / with your family / with friends?
Do you play any computer games?
How often do you play? For how long?
What are the pros and cons of computer games?
